body.name: Duracell 2450 3V Lithium Battery, 1 Count Pack, Lithium Coin Battery for Medical and Fitness Devices, Watches, and more, CR Lithium 3 Volt Cell

features: LONG-LASTING BATTERIES DESIGNED FOR DEPENDABILITY – Duracell Lithium Coin Batteries deliver the long-lasting power and performance you can count on for electronic devices throughout the home or on-the-go. They are designed for use in keyfobs, small remotes, scales, wearables, sensors, medical devices (glucometers, digital thermometers), sports devices (heart rate monitor, bike accessories)

RELIABLE POWER – The Duracell 2450 3V Lithium Coin battery is equivalent to DL2450 and CR2450, and powers both everyday and essential home devices, including medical devices, watches, toys, fitness devices, security devices, and more
CHILD-RESISTANT PACKAGING – To help ensure the safety of your children, Duracell Lithium Coin batteries come in a child-resistant package
GUARANTEED FOR 10 YEARS IN STORAGE – Holds power up to a decade in storage, so you can be confident these batteries will be ready when you need them
#1 TRUSTED BATTERY BRAND – From storm season to medical needs to the holidays, Duracell is the #1 trusted battery brand
body.description: Reliable, long-lasting power for your medical, electronic, security, and other compatible devices, Duracell Lithium Coin batteries are guaranteed for 10 years in storage, so you can be confident they’ll be ready when you need them. Duracell invests in the extensive development of features that can help keep children safe, especially for its Lithium Coin batteries which feature child-secure packaging which makes it nearly impossible to open with bare hands. From storm season to medical needs to the holidays, Duracell is the #1 trusted battery brand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Much more than just watch batteries, Duracell Lithium Coin and Button batteries are also ideal for remotes, battery alarm clocks and many other devices. With long-lasting power, Duracell coin batteries offer Duracell quality in a variety of sizes.

At a Glance: Ideal for medical and security devices, digital cameras, watches and toys Triple corrosion protection protects the battery from oxidation and rust Duracell 2450 3V Lithium Coin Battery Reliable, long-lasting power for your medical, electronic and security devices Duracell Lithium Coin and Button batteries provide reliable, long-lasting power for your specialty devices, so you can be confident these lithium coin and button batteries will be ready when you need them. These lithium coin and button batteries have been designed with child-resistant packaging for added safety. Duracell Lithium Coin and Button batteries are great for devices like glucometers, calculators, car remotes and many other specialty devices.

Duracell: A Reliable Battery for All of Your Devices Watch Battery Duracell makes alkaline, lithium, and silver oxide coin and button batteries to power watches. Security Device Battery Important security devices like your key fob or car alarm require coin and button batteries to function properly. Calculator Battery Calculators, handheld games, toys and other electronic devices also require coin and button batteries. Medical Device Battery Duracell medical batteries fit devices like glucose meters, blood-pressure monitors, defibrillators, pulse oximeters, body composition analyzers and more.
Child-Resistant Packaging To help ensure the safety of your children, Duracell Lithium Coin and Button batteries have been designed with child-resistant packaging.

Coin Batteries Alkaline Batteries Hearing Aid Batteries Rechargeable Batteries Specialty Batteries Available Sizes Varies AA, AAA, C, D, 9V 10 (Yellow), 312 (Brown), 13 (Orange), 675 (Blue) AA, AAA NiMH Varies Best Uses Medical devices, security devices, fitness devices, watches, calculators, electronics and more Toys, remote controls, flashlights, calculators, clocks, radios, portable electronics, wireless mice and keyboards Hearing aids Video game controllers, wireless electronics, baby monitors and more Cameras, car alarm, key fob, GPS tracker, child locator, remote controller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed MyQ Low Battery
reviews.reviewText: I had generic 2450 batteries left but after trying two batteries, they apparently no longer worked. I purchased the Duracell brand to try making sure the issue is not bad sensor. The fresh Duracell battery fixed the problem. Great brand at low price from Amazon. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last a long time
reviews.reviewText: These batteries last a long time, and never leak like alkaline batteries do. I prefer Duracell over the off brand types because I can trust them. The price is good, so if you need one, why not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap enough I guess
reviews.reviewText: A bit pricier than the store but I needed it asap. Great brand and great battery. Last almost 1 year on my garage door sensor. Would Buy again if I forget to buy on time again..!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price & fast shipping.
reviews.reviewText: I could buy this size battery for less money but they weren't a name brand. I bought these to go in my door sensors for my Genie Alladin Connect. The frist ones lasted over a year so wanted a name brand battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very fast and good price, but old product
reviews.reviewText: I want to say that the sell was prompt, and the price was great. Unfortunately, the battery seems to have been sitting on a shelf for a few years because it was in even worse shape than the one being replaced. It barely powers the remote (and yes, it is the recommended OEM). Not the sellers fault, than I can determine, hence the 4 stars, but a big disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product for my welding helmets. At 20% of what I would pay at the local hardware it is a no brainer. The shelf life date is current and I check voltage before I install them. They check out perfect every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit my car remote perfectly and was ordered and delivered in one day.Also, the best price and no need to buy multi-pack which is all that I could find at the stores i went to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace the dying battery in my car's remote control. Worked like a charm and I like how it was packaged. Encapsulated in tough plastic inside the outer packaging.I've bought batteries on Amazon before and many have arrived dead, believe it or not (I have a battery tester), but not this one. Full charge, very please and because it's a Duracell, ir should last a long, long time.Very pleased.
